mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_table (id, user_name, user_password, user_nickname, user_email, user_avatar_url, user_register_time, user_status) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{avatar_url}, #{register_time}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name, user_nickname, user_email, user_avatar_url, user_register_time, user_status FROM user_table WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, user_name, user_password FROM user_table WHERE user_name=#{name}
